Entry.JapaneseText: どこへ行けばいいんだ、シャオルーン！
世界中のあちこちで争いが起きてるみたいなんだ！ とにかく手当たり次第に降りてみるしかない！
Entry.EnglishText: It looks like there are fights breaking out all over the world! We'll just have to stop by anywhere and everywhere!

Entry.JapaneseText: その、聖獣の力、みたいなので なんとかならないのかよ！
Entry.EnglishText: Wouldn't your Sacred Beast powers be able to help us narrow things down?!

Entry.JapaneseText: 世界中から負の感情が立ちのぼってくるんだ。 どこがヒドイかなんてまったくわからない！
Entry.EnglishText: There are negative emotions eminating from all over the world. I can't tell where they're coming from!

Entry.JapaneseText: やはり片っ端から探す他ないようだな……
Entry.EnglishText: So I guess we have no choice other than to scour the globe...
